meanings.definition: A polygon with four sides and four angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew several tetragons on my math homework.
meanings.sent2: The playground had colorful tetragons painted on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a masterpiece using only tetragons.
meanings.sent4: Her love for tetragons was as strong as her love for ice cream.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used tetragons to teach us about shapes.

meanings.definition: A figure or shape with four sides.
meanings.sent1: The cake was cut into small tetragons for the party guests.
meanings.sent2: The logo of the company featured interlocking tetragons.
meanings.sent3: The garden was filled with colorful tetragons made of flowers.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a maze of interconnected tetragons, each representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The building's architecture was inspired by ancient tetragons.
